role: Full Stack Developer & Digital Solutions Architect
hero_description: Crafting exceptional digital experiences through elegant code, innovative automation, and scalable e-commerce solutions that drive business growth.
technologies_desc: Specialized in modern web technologies, automation tools, and scalable solutions
experience_projects_desc: A snapshot of my professional journey and selected works
about_me_desc: I'm Felix Macaspac, a passionate HubSpot CMS developer from the Philippines with 5 years of experience building scalable web applications and custom CMS solutions. I specialize in HubSpot development, creating seamless user experiences and optimizing content management workflows. When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new web technologies and contributing to the developer community.
ecommerce_platform_desc: Modern e-commerce platform with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL featuring payment processing and real-time inventory.
task_management_app_desc: Collaborative task management with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team features.
